Style/InverseMethods.description:
Description

Use the inverse method instead of `!.method` if an inverse method is defined.
Style/InverseMethods.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

InverseMethods: {':any?': ':none?', ':even?': ':odd?', ':==': ':!=', ':=~': ':!~', ':<': ':>=', ':>': ':<='} (type: dict)
InverseBlocks: {':select': ':reject', ':select!': ':reject!'} (type: dict)
